Missyou hologram fan Technology changes life, welcome to learn about holographic advertising machine Missyou Intelligent Technology's independent research and development and manufacturer of 3D holographic advertising machines and holographic vision systems have always focused on innovative technology and cutting-edge products. Starting from the earliest 42CM double-leaf fan screen, it took the lead in researching and developing a series of brushless motors and cloud control systems, realizing real-time control content, and launching a full range of professional-grade holographic advertising machines, supporting multi-screen splicing and other products, which not only fills up domestic and foreign Many technology gaps have been exported to more than 80 countries and regions including America, Europe, Australia, Asia, Africa, etc., and have become a global leader in the same industry. Missyou Intelligence has always been adhering to the "holographic imaging system" as the core development direction, and through multi-level aerial non-screen display solutions, to bring humans a new visual sensory experience.

Very easy to change video，Multiple video loop playback high resolution Very easy to change video，Multiple video loop playback 3D holographic advertising machine, this is a combination of fan rotation + LED light bar display, using the principle of human eye persistence to form an aerial phantom of graphics, animation and video. When imaging, all LED lights emit light, and the surrounding shell is dark and does not emit light. In this way, when the 3D holographic advertising machine is operated, the human eye will only receive the light staying, and the dark color and no light will be too fast to fail. Recognized by the brain, the display effect will only stay on the light displayed by the LED light, so that the effect of aerial imaging is realized, and then a 3D floating image is presented. The working principle of the 3D holographic advertising machine is mainly to use the persistence factor of human vision (POV technology), through one or several columns of LEDs densely arranged and then rotating imaging. In detail, the visual effect produced by light on the retina will remain for a period of time after the light stops working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Hologram Fan
reviews.reviewText: WOW this fan is absolutely great, I love it. I purchased it hoping that it will work well, and it sure lived up to my expectations. The packaging box is nice and sturdy, the fan arrived without any damages. I was able to setup the fan on my wall without any issues. I was now time to setup the software, at first I contacted customer service because i didn't know the software was on the SD card, but they were very quick to repond to guide me in the right direction. The software was easy to install, including the wifi feature, i was able to create my own bin files and had the fan up and running. It is really beautiful, very bright, you can hear the fan but not very distracting. I love this fan, hope it lasts a long time. Good product, if looking for a fan I would recommend you buy this fan.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars really cool hologram and super helpful seller
reviews.reviewText: the holograms are so cool and very easy to set up. The seller provided so many resources and was able to even help make custom videos. The hologram displays really elevate the signage experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap, low res, spins dangerously fast, terrible app/instructions, but it works.
reviews.reviewText: You get what you pay for.The instruction manual tells you how to open the software, but not how to use it.Apparently the first step is to select the model in the dropdown menu at the top right. I got the 42cm model, which is model SD224, not that that's listed anywhere. I just tried all the options til one worked.Then click on the icon next to file encode, select the file to encode, select the destination file, and your file will be displayed in a little window with a red circle to select what area to display.Once the red circle is where you want it, click the icon again to start encoding. Another little preview window will pop up, then it'll go away and tell you it's done.Copy the resulting .bat file to the micro-SD card, and I deleted the rest of the .bat files on the card to make sure it displayed mine. Put the card back in the display, power it up, and it should work.Mine fails to initialize occasionally. Just unplug the power, plug it back in, and it might work.So, once you figure it out, it'll work for its one purpose - displaying a short video while making you fear for the safety of everyone in arm's reach. I plan to make a plexiglass box around mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Fan stopped working after only 2 hours of use
reviews.reviewText: This fan started off good. Then after a few hours of use in my business it just froze and went to a solid dot in the center.The seller and I have gone back and forth with solutions for the problem and I have tried everything and it is still not working. Seller promised a new unit and has delayed continuously. DO NOT BUY THIS UNIT. BUYERS BEWARE. SELLER IS NO HELP WITH MALFUNCTIONING PRODUCT.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price but learning curve
reviews.reviewText: Saw the many positive reviews plus good references outside of Amazon. Product was in new condition without any problems when arrived, powered up immediately and started showing all the many 3d holograms. Now I have many more added from the 700 provided from the vendor free downloads.What you need to know is that the software can also be loaded on your PC and is located on the USB drive that is included (USB drive also has a micro-SD slot). It allows you to send files from your PC and put files on the micro-SD card (which then goes into the 3d hologram fan). Once you figure that out, it's fairly straight forward but you do need to convert the files to the right size of device type you purchased.for the smaller 3D hologram device which I purchased (16.5 inch), you have to select the correct input option within the software. Mine was F1 equipment type but works great every time now and now I wish I would've bought a bigger/better one for greater brightness and visual.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars For IT Professionals ONLY!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these fans thinking to hang them on a bare wall to bring some interest into an otherwise bland space. Once I received the fans the unboxing and initial setup was pretty simple. They come with a TF card preloaded with files that create holographic images of a dragon, butterfly, jellyfish, camera,etc. As they are from the factory the various images on the TF card are displayed one after the other. However, I did not purchase the two fans just to have a series of preloaded images be displayed overt and over. I wanted to be able to take my own images and have then displayed as a hologram.The instructions for converting an image into a file format which the fan can read and turn into a hologram are a joke. Partially in Chinese, the instructions are a jumble of confusion. I have a university degree, my brother has a Ph.D. and together we cannot determine the steps necessary to make the fans work as intended. Communication with the company in China gets a link to videos, again in Chinese, which must skip or omit critical steps because the image I have after following the instructions will not play as a hologram on the fan.I have spent at least 30 hours trying to get some use out of these fans but as of this review they are simply collecting dust on a closet shelf. My advice is unless you are extremely familiar with the file formats used by the fans, don't waste your time or money. You really do not need yet another useless product collecting dust on a closet shelf. And if you just have to have one, send postage and I'll give you one or both of mine. Love the idea of the hologram fans but hate the impossibility of executing it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing product and great customer service
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this holographic fan, and I am absolutely thrilled with it! This product deserves a solid 5-star review. The holographic displays are mesmerizing, creating a stunning visual experience. The fan’s build quality is excellent, and it’s user-friendly, making it easy to customize the holograms. It’s a fantastic addition to any room, providing both entertainment and a cool breeze. I couldn’t be happier with my purchase! Shipping is so fast, I got it within 2 days. Customer service is amazing. They answer my queries right away.. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for the Holidays and other celebration during the year. Pretty large and visible from fsr away. Could have better instructions but never the has enough to get things done. Remote is a great option and easy to use. Also has a USB drive to add more images.

Ich habe dieses Hologramm für meinen Sohn zu Weihnachten bestellt. Das Preis-Leistungverhältnis ist gut. Es kam pünktlich an. Die Anbringung an der Wand war einfach und das Hologramm gefällt meinem Sohn sehr. Die Original-Aufnahmen funktionieren sehr gut. Sie sehen toll aus.

reviews.reviewerName: Leuk toestelletje maar moeilijke software vind ik.

reviews.reviewText: Pese a ser de un dispositivo de una única aspa, tiene muy buena resolución. Además del mando a distancia, se puede operar mediante la app. Es importante que cuando se use no acercar las manos, el aparato gira muy rápido y puede ocasionar heridas, mantenerlo alejado de los más pequeños. Incluye algunas imagenes bastante divertidas, aún no he probado usar las mias animadas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: De combinatie van prijs en product leek mij goed in balans. Maar eenmaal ontvangen bleek de app totaal niet te reageren. De micro chip dat erin zat bevatte software dat niet overeenkwam met het instructie filmpje. 3D bleek 2D te zijn enz. Wat een teleurstelling. Dan is elke cent te veel om eraan uit te geven.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on December 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: leuk voor de hobby maar er blijven in de afbeelding veel donkere strepen achter omdat de leds niet strak aansluiten de software is goed en werkt prima
